top_stories.title: NIH researchers discover tissue biomarker that may indicate higher risk of aggressive breast cancer development and death
top_stories.description: Using artificial intelligence, scientists characterized tissue samples from more than 9,000 women.

top_stories.title: Infant with rare, incurable disease is first to successfully receive personalized gene therapy treatment
top_stories.description: NIH-supported gene-editing platform lays groundwork to rapidly develop treatments for other rare genetic diseases.

top_stories.title: NIH researchers develop biomarker score for predicting diets high in ultra-processed foods
top_stories.description: Poly-metabolite scores could reduce reliance on self-reported dietary data in large population studies.

top_stories.title: Scientists design gene delivery systems for cells in the brain and spinal cord
top_stories.description: NIH-funded breakthrough could enable targeted therapies for many neurological disorders.

top_stories.title: NIH scientists test in an animal model a surgical technique to improve cell therapy for dry AMD
top_stories.description: The technique may enable higher doses and combinations of cell therapies.
